599440.name: RPG Maker MV - Hiroki Kikuta music pack: The Fury
599440.description:
From the legendary composer and creative mind Hiroki Kikuta comes a unique new music pack you can use in your RPG Maker projects! Inspired by both classic and modern fantasy, The Fury features Hiroki Kikuta's memorable style and flowing melodies. From imperial marches to battle themes and beyond, Fury theme is a piercing and fast-paced journey into the unknown.

The familiar.mp3 file format makes this pack the perfect playlist for you to listen to while developing your game. Grab this must-have music pack and bring some oomph to your growing library of RPG Maker resources!

Contents:
  • BGM 01 - Fearless Adventurers
  • BGM 02 - Battle Against All Odds
  • BGM 03 - Army of the Forest
  • BGM 04 - Advancement to Victory
  • BGM 05 - Evil Leaves Its Mark
  • BGM 06 - Stalwart Guardians Appear
  • BGM 07 - Fury of the Fallen God
  • BGM 08 - Imperial Masquerade
  • BGM 09 - Marching Into Battle
  • BGM 10 - Thief Among The Pyramids
  • BGM 11 - The Sarcophagus Opens
  • BGM 12 - Encounter With Malice
  • ME 01 - Victory March
  • ME 02 - Grand Success

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Makers or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
599440.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 日语, 韩语, 繁体中文, 阿拉伯语, 简体中文
